title: Natural Capital Protocol Framework
cleaned_text: The Protocol Framework infographic covers four stages, "Why", "What", "How", and "What Next". Protocol Stages are further broken down into nine Steps, which contain specific questions to be answered when carrying out a natural capital assessment.
